channel.title: Is there any way to update the appearance to an npc
channel.description:
the thing is that i change the type of an npc, and the npc becomes the new npc, but the appearance is still the old one
For example Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType = BALD_SHEEP; but it still looks like a normal sheep.

item.title: Is there any way to update the appearance to an npc
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

nvm used transformation mask ty

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to update the appearance to an npc

item.title: Is there any way to update the appearance to an npc
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

You would need to do something like

Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] = the bald sheep instance.

Read full topic
